EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP: Appetizers, Drinks and the History of the TPE331 Engine
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
(Optional) This text will appear in the inbox preview, but not the email body.
The History and Making of the TPE331 Engine in Skydiving
Join Honeywell and Texas Turbine Conversions for dinner, drinks and the TPE331 engine at the 2017 British Parachute Association Skydive Expo as we discuss The History and Making of the TPE331 in Skydiving on January 27.
Hear from our very own Bobby Bishop, President of Texas Turbine Conversions and Lisa Morris, TPE331 Product Line Director at Honeywell talk about how the TPE331 got its start in skydiving and why its still used by several skydiving companies more than 50 years later.
Event Details:
When: January 27, 2017 7pm-9pm
Where: BPA Skydive Expo "Untitled" Conference Room East Midlands Conference Centre (EMCC) University Park, Nottingham NG7 2RJ
Speakers: Bobby Bishop, President of Texas Turbine Conversions
Lisa Morris, TPE331 Product Line Director at Honeywell
Meal: Something delicious
